mapper.update: update tb_funds_log set comment = #{comment}, approver_id = #{approverId},status =#{ status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select f.id ,p.remaining_funds as remainingFunds,u.name as applicant,f.applied_funds as appliedFunds,f.reason as reason,f.project_id as projectId,f.applied_time as appliedTime from tb_funds_log f left join tb_project_info p on f.project_id = p.id left join tb_user_info u on f.applicant_id = u.id where f.approver_id is null and f.status = 0

select id,project_id as projectId,applicant_id as applicantId,applied_funds as appliedFunds,reason,comment,approver_id as approverId,applied_time as appliedTime ,update_time as updateTime,status from tb_funds_log where id = #{id}

select id,project_id as projectId,applicant_id as applicantId,applied_funds as appliedFunds,reason,comment,approver_id as approverId,applied_time as appliedTime ,update_time as updateTime,status from tb_funds_log where approver_id is not null order by projectId
select count(*) from tb_funds_log where approver_id is null and status = 0
